# Floats

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class               | Support     |
| ------------------- | ----------- |
| `float-right`       | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `float-left`        | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `float-none`        | ğŸŒ Web only |
